author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Add some doFooTransaction variants, that allow for the
transaction timeout to be specified, and deprecate the old ones.
Additionally, the Callable now comes first, as that is groovy

author: doogie
msg: FEATURE: Reworked Callable helper methods to support wrapping/proxying, so
that calling code can pass the reconstructed objects directly to
As a nice side effect, these classes show up in exceptions, so you can
know a bit more about the transaction nature of the call stack.
